attributes.action: stop discrimination against childless married couples and single people and the unemployed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: whenever we see any housing benefits or social security or unemployment benefits they always seem to favour families and penalise and negate whatever little the childless married couples, unemployed and single people get, if anything at all.This is blatant favouritism and anti-singles and married couples.It must be stamped out at once.
